Defines

#define SPI_DataSize_16b   ((uint16_t)0x0800)
#define SPI_DataSize_8b   ((uint16_t)0x0000)
#define IS_SPI_DATASIZE(DATASIZE)

Define Documentation

Value:
(((DATASIZE) == SPI_DataSize_16b) || \
                                   ((DATASIZE) == SPI_DataSize_8b))
